# UITextItem.Content

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe and capture the type of content a text item represents along with a specific related value.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Content
```

## Getting the content type

- **UITextItem.Content.link(_:)**: A link to a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.
- **UITextItem.Content.tag(_:)**: A string that represents a custom tag for a topic.
- **UITextItem.Content.textAttachment(_:)**: A text attachment, such as an image or view.

## Specifying the content type

- **content**: The content type and related value of the text item.

items.description: A link to a resource, such as an item on a remote server or the path to a local file.
items.name: UITextItem.Content.link(_:)

items.description: A string that represents a custom tag for a topic.
